goals.active: Recruit the quaggan outcast Baroosh to defend the village.
goals.complete: Sashoo led us to Baroosh, one of the few quaggan who isn't ashamed to shift into his enraged form and fight. Baroosh took some convincing—the villagers have shunned him for years for his lack of shame— but once he saw the quaggans that had been corrupted into icebrood, he agreed to join in the defense of Falooaloo Village.
